entities.label: United Nations Savings and Credit Cooperative (UN-SACCO)

edges.label: 1. Investigation Initiated
edges.tooltip: Investigation into fraudulent conduct was prompted by activities at UNICEF/Somalia Support Centre.

edges.label: 2. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: UNON staff were investigated for fraudulent conduct involving loan applications.

edges.label: 3. Loan Application Review
edges.tooltip: UN-SACCO loan files were reviewed during the investigation.

edges.label: 4. Alleged Misconduct
edges.tooltip: UNICEF staff were alleged to have misused official letterhead and seal to secure loans.

edges.label: 5. Alleged Involvement
edges.tooltip: Senior UNEP Manager was involved in writing letters that could imply contract extensions.

edges.label: 6. Fraudulent Letters Accepted
edges.tooltip: UNICEF staff produced fraudulent letters accepted by UN-SACCO management.

UNICEF Staff: Misuse of official letterhead and seal to secure loans.
Senior UNEP Manager: Involved in writing letters that may imply contract extensions for loan purposes.
